messages.text: What are the plans for the weekend
Did the older kids get out of the bases?
Anat doesn't leave the house
Idan arrived an hour ago, for 24 hours
Sapir no. They're locked down for 60 days. Meaning, they told them to prepare mentally for 60 consecutive days
Wowwww 🖐️
What do you say
Jesse's reserve duty partner in Judea and Samaria
Shared some shocking experiences, I must say
For example
There aren't weapons for everyone
There's no ammunition
They confiscated all the Arabs' SUVs for the area
The Jews also received vehicle requisition orders for the IDF
Vostin Ceramics is buying from direct donations
But that's old news already
The Haredim in Judea and Samaria?
P
Why there, specifically?
Why not in Ramat Aviv?
Maybe in other places too
He's describing entire lots full of vehicles
Civilian vehicles confiscated or drafted
They received old weapons with metal sights
The Russians would take them back
Wanted to zero them in, was told there's no ammunition at all
What a life we lead
With all the transport planes with weapons and ammo from America, how come there aren't enough rounds?
I have no idea
